title: Gutar Gu
overview: Ritu joins a coaching class in Bhopal and notices Anuj on the first day. She introduces herself to Anuj, which startles him. He seeks advice from friends on how to impress her. Ritu asks Anuj to help her explore the city but he cancels at the last minute. Anuj writes a love letter and must now confess his feelings to Ritu and pray she feels the same way.

tv.episodeOverview: Shivangi enters the world of Gutar Gu as Anuj's playwright. Little does she know that this play is Anuj's ticket to meeting Ritu in Ahmedabad and she starts to make a move on Anuj and the real test of his fidelity for Ritu begins. Shivangi and Anuj end up in situations that make Ritu question Anuj's loyalty. Anuj comes clean to Ritu but will she forgive and forget this one mistake?
